name: wdk-starter-react-native-e2e
description: WDK Starter React Native E2E Tests

scripts.test: export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools && wdio run wdio.conf.ts
scripts.build-apk: export JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home -v 21) && export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH && cd .. && npx expo export --platform android --output-dir ./dist && npx expo prebuild --platform android --clean && echo "sdk.dir=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk" > android/local.properties && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cp app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk ../e2e/apps/app-release.apk
scripts.build-ios: cd ../ios && xcodebuild -workspace wdkstarterreactnative.xcworkspace -scheme wdkstarterreactnative -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath build -quiet && find build -name '*.app' -exec cp -r {} ../e2e/apps/wdkstarterreactnative.app \;
